name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 8, elderly people from Guangdong who came to Beijing to petition over the "inverted pension" issue were intercepted by the police at the airport.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Currently, topics related to Chongqing's second delay in school opening have been banned

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 4, Qingdao, Shandong. Bus drivers in Jimo District have been owed wages for more than half a year. The drivers went to protest their rights and demand their wages, but were stopped by the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Because the Chongqing Education Commission insisted that students return to school, students began to publicly question the accounting issues of the Chongqing Education Commission online.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Hainan University forced to resume normal classes when the water and electricity supply on campus had not yet fully returned to normal, which caused dissatisfaction among students. As a result, the school teachers frequently made golden sentences. Some teachers accused students of not having suffered, and some teachers said that they could use electricity and sleep in the classroom.
Students were also asked to clear trees in the rain to pose for photos and post them on the school's official account. When questioned, a teacher named Wu Qiong accused students of raising their awareness.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On September 8, at Xujiahui Park in Shanghai, it was reported online that several black people who often played basketball in the park started shoving each other, and were then surrounded and beaten by Chinese people.
The Chinese at the scene shouted, "If you beat people on our Chinese territory, get out!" "Don't indulge them"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On September 8, in Panyu, Guangdong, a netizen filmed a video of a fire truck that was unable to drive into a residential area. In the comment section, many netizens complained about the poor driving skills of the fire truck.
In the end, the police station still came to the door and asked to delete the video.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: After the Tai'an Middle School bus hit students, the local authorities issued a notice requiring all units to monitor online public opinion and report it every day.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A blogger roughly counted the leaders of state-owned enterprises who resigned recently.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The Washington Post quoted two unnamed former U.S. officials on September 8 as saying that Qin Gang's status has dropped significantly from his once high position of close relationship with Chinese President Xi Jinping, and he is currently receiving a salary from a state-owned publishing house under the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 8, Shanghai. The old man said in front of the camera that the stock market will always spiral upward. Some people say it will fall to 2,300 or 2,400 points. I doubt whether they understand stocks at all! 2,635 points will never fall below.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 8, Academician Chen Junshi said at the "2024 Food and Health Communication Conference" that food rumors are no less harmful than foodborne diseases, which was boycotted and ridiculed by many netizens. Netizens responded, "Are there more rumors or more food problems?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 8 (Release) At No. 138 Nanjing East Road, Shanghai, a Meituan delivery rider held up a sign on the street, calling for "The times are calling for China's Martin Luther King. Today's society needs a communication and negotiation mechanism for different classes!" "We want our own union, our own interest representatives, and an eight-hour work system, not 300 hours a month. The development of society is to give people time to live a better life, not to have no time to live."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Today is the 48th anniversary of Mao Zedong's death. Major official media outlets have published articles to commemorate him. One netizen posted a message on Weibo saying, "Nonsense, are there still people speaking for this devil? And still calling him a teacher? This devil cannot have any descendants." The netizen was subsequently reported by others and his account was banned.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a woman in Beijing posted on Xiaohongshu that "I earn less than a parking space in Beijing." The woman said that her internship salary was only over 100 yuan a day, and she had to work 12 hours a day, and her hourly wage was only 12.5 yuan. The parking space in Haidian District charges 16 yuan per hour.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 8, CCTV reported: China imported lamb products from Africa for the first time.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Due to the frequent safety accidents of new energy vehicles in China, hotels and office buildings in many places in Zhejiang Province have successively banned new energy vehicles from being parked in underground garages, which has attracted outside attention.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Although the "Internet celebrity stopping Japanese from taking photos in the Old Summer Palace" was criticized by many netizens and official media, under Tencent News, there are still a large number of netizens who expressed their support for the Internet celebrity and the security guard's behavior.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, in Xi'an, Shaanxi, it was revealed online that Xi'an Peihua College made students stand at attention for a long time during military training in 39° weather, causing many students to suffer from heat stroke. According to students, many students were dehydrated, but the chief of staff did not allow them to drink water.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 9, internal training materials for counselors at a university in Tianjin were circulated online. The materials showed that each college should build a student information team with firm political stance and keen sense of smell, and pay attention to students with public opinion risks. For students with "serious" grades, their social media accounts should be paid special attention. In addition, each college should regularly conduct a survey on the religious beliefs of teachers and students.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a blogger posted a video saying that "Musk's Starlink will open the function of directly connecting mobile phones to satellites for emergency calls for free." Netizens responded that "every time there is a major innovation, I have never caught up with the hot ones" and "we have a magnetic field that can bounce Starlink like a ball."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 8 (Released) Guangzhou, Guangdong. The self-service machine of the Guangzhou Public Security Bureau cannot give bad reviews. When clicking one or two stars, there is no "Submit Review" option below.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a netizen posted a video saying that he came to Japan to find the internet celebrity "Toyo Ono Ryo" to buy a cello in the form of currency exchange. After arriving in Japan, the netizen transferred 495,000 RMB to Ono Ryo. After that, Ono Ryo delayed exchanging currency for the netizen, and the netizen also spent all the money he had. Ono Ryo said that "the account needs to be transferred before next Friday." On next Friday, Ono Ryo talked to the netizen about a house, but the netizen said that he had never talked to "Ono Ryo" about buying a house.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 7, "東ying Ono Ryo" posted a video in response saying, "I don't even know you, how did you transfer money to me? You didn't provide me with any projects. What benefits can I get here? Is my company exchanging money?" Ono Ryo said that at first he wanted to do real estate business through the company, but then he changed his mind. However, the company could not refund the intention money, so he could only use the money on real estate projects.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a disabled fitness blogger posted photos of himself working out on a social platform, and was verbally abused by netizens. Afterwards, the netizen said that he did not feel any guilt, saying that if even the most basic body is not intact, what is the value of living!

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 8, a Taiwanese blogger posted his passport on a social platform. Many netizens expressed their desire for it in the comment section and asked where they could get it.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 8, Xi'an, Shaanxi. A mortgage defaulter said that he spent 2.3 million yuan to buy a school district house in 2021, with a down payment of 690,000 yuan and a loan of 1.61 million yuan. The monthly payment was 8,900 yuan, and he stopped paying this year due to special reasons. In the end, his bank card and WeChat were frozen by the bank, and the house was also auctioned by the court with a starting price of 1.33 million yuan. He said that not only did he lose the house and the down payment, he also owed the bank more than 300,000 yuan, plus the previous monthly payment of 260,000 yuan, the loss was as high as more than 1 million yuan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: China responds to Japanese tourists being stopped from taking photos at the Old Summer Palace; Ministry of Foreign Affairs: We will not comment on individual words and deeds, and China will not take discriminatory measures against any specific country.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 9 (Released) A man walked down the street holding a banner that read "It's shameful to have only one day off a week".

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Screenshots taken on campus provided by students
